item.title: Introducing Microsoft Purview Data Security pay-as-you-go pricing for your non-Microsoft 365 data
item.description: Microsoft Purview is an extensive set of solutions that can help organizations secure and govern their data, wherever it lives. The unification of data security and governance capabilities in Microsoft Purview reflects our belief that our customers need a simpler approach to data. Microsoft Purview Data Security helps customers dynamically secure their data across its lifecycle by combining data context with user context.
